protocol.name: P-G8365-1
protocol.text: Seeds sown on  filter paper on media (1x MS, 3% sucrose, 0.8% agar); stratified at 4C for 4 d; grown for 7 d at 22C in 12-h  light (cool white fluorescence tubes, ~120 ¼mol m-2 s-1)/12-h dark cycles before being released into free-running conditions of constant white light, 22C; sample collection initiated at subjective dawn of day 9

protocol.name: P-G8365-2
protocol.text: Samples were collected at 4-h intervals (by freezing in liquid nitrogen) while growing in constant light conditions

protocol.name: P-G8365-3
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 ¼g total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-G8365-4
protocol.text: Qiagen's RNeasy Plant Mini Kit was used for extraction of total RNA according to the manufacturer's instructions.
